languages.text: ~// В следующем космобою {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}Уклонение{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}флагмана{/g} увеличено на +15% против врагов (Некрон)

traits.locale_text: ~// В следующем космобою {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}Уклонение{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}флагмана{/g} увеличено на +15% против врагов (Некрон)

languages.text: During the next combat, your {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}evasion{/g} will be increased by +15% against Necron enemies.
languages.original_text: Во время следующего боя ваш {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}флагман{/g}' {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}уклонение{/g} будет увеличено на +15% против врагов Некрона.

traits.locale_text: During the next combat, your {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}evasion{/g} will be increased by +15% against Necron enemies.
During the next combat, your {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}evasion{/g} will be increased by +15% against Necron enemies.
During the next combat, your {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}evasion{/g} will be increased by +15% against Necron enemies.

languages.text: Bir sonraki çatışmada {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}sancak geminin{/g} Nekron düşmanlara karşı {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}sıyrılma{/g} değeri %15 artar.
languages.original_text: During the next combat, your {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}evasion{/g} will be increased by +15% against Necron enemies.

traits.locale_text: Bir sonraki çatışmada {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}sancak geminin{/g} Nekron düşmanlara karşı {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}sıyrılma{/g} değeri %15 artar.

languages.text: Durante el próximo combate, la {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}Esquiva{/g} de tu {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}nave insignia{/g} aumentará en un +15 % contra enemigos Necrones.
languages.original_text: During the next combat, your {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}evasion{/g} will be increased by +15% against Necron enemies.

traits.locale_text: Durante el próximo combate, la {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}Esquiva{/g} de tu {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}nave insignia{/g} aumentará en un +15 % contra enemigos Necrones.

languages.text: 在下一场战斗中，{g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}旗舰{/g}在对抗太空死灵时，{g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}闪避{/g}提高15%。
languages.original_text: During the next combat, your {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}evasion{/g} will be increased by +15% against Necron enemies.

traits.locale_text: 在下一场战斗中，{g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}旗舰{/g}在对抗太空死灵时，{g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}闪避{/g}提高15%。

languages.text: Im nächsten Kampf wird das {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}Ausweichen{/g} deines {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}Flaggschiffs{/g} gegen Nekron-Gegner um +15 % erhöht.
languages.original_text: During the next combat, your {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}evasion{/g} will be increased by +15% against Necron enemies.

traits.locale_text: Im nächsten Kampf wird das {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}Ausweichen{/g} deines {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}Flaggschiffs{/g} gegen Nekron-Gegner um +15 % erhöht.

languages.text: Au cours du prochain combat, l'{g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}évitement{/g} de votre {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}vaisseau amiral{/g} sera augmenté de +15 % contre les ennemis de type Nécron.
languages.original_text: During the next combat, your {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}evasion{/g} will be increased by +15% against Necron enemies.

traits.locale_text: Au cours du prochain combat, l'{g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}évitement{/g} de votre {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}vaisseau amiral{/g} sera augmenté de +15 % contre les ennemis de type Nécron.

languages.text: 次の戦闘で、{g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}旗艦{/g}の{g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}回避{/g}は、ネクロンの敵に対して+15%増加する。
languages.original_text: During the next combat, your {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}evasion{/g} will be increased by +15% against Necron enemies.

traits.locale_text: 次の戦闘で、{g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}旗艦{/g}の{g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}回避{/g}は、ネクロンの敵に対して+15%増加する。

languages.text: Во время следующего боя ваш {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}флагман{/g}' {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}уклонение{/g} будет увеличено на +15% против врагов Некрона.
